title: Get a migration subtask
description: Gets the details of a specific migration subtask from the BigQuery Migration Service. This is useful for checking the status or configuration of a component within a larger migration workflow.

objective.narrative: This sample shows how to fetch a single migration subtask. Developers can use this to programmatically monitor a migration's progress, debug a specific subtask failure, or build custom reporting and alerting tools based on subtask state.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2_migrationservice_migrationsubtask_get
